description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Eat / shoot your way through endless levels of Arcade Snake action including 25 distinct maze patterns.  The "trial version" of the game features the first 4 levels of play.  Four game difficulty modes:  Easy / Medium / Hard / Extreme.
